attributes.action: Give vaccine & stop badger cull NOW.
attributes.additional_details: I think the badger cull is disgusting in this day & age & being a animal loving country,but we decide,not the public,to kill animals that have more rights to life than we do,who are we to decide,only nature decides.The amount of money this cost would of been better spent on baiting food with vaccines only they would eat,including cows & foxes.Everywhere we look there are cases of animal cruelty,home owners,buisness's & farms but we do it with nature too.All animals & our green areas should be first on our list,not killing innocent animals who cannot defend them selves & have no choice.The countries values are not viewed the same as the gov & past gov.
